title: Pixel Survival

controls: WASD or arrow keys to moveLeft mouse click to shootRight mouse click to aimI or E to open inventoryF for picking thingsTab for scoreSpacebar to jumpShift to run  P or Esc to pause the game
content.howToPlay:
Before you start playing, you must select a level and character. You can have a quick training to get used to controls in Training Mode. Select SandBox mode to explore without concerns. Or else, you choose Zombie Land and will have to overcome numerous challenges.

Each character has its own toolset. For example, Policeman spawns with a gun while the farmer has a farming tool. Sports Girl has everything necessary. Try Salaryman, Medic, Sports Girl, Farmer or Policeman and decide who suits your personality more.

You can see the percentage for drink, food and life on the left screen. Eat and drink enough to provide energy for the character. Choose between equipment on the bottom of your screen.
content.developer: Pixel Survival is created by FreezeNova.

fullContent: Home› ActionPixel SurvivalBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenPixel Survival is an online pixelated browser game similar to Minecraft's survival mode. In Pixel Survival, you have to survive in the wild, the unknown world. You will be in the jungle, and you have water, food and weapons at your disposal. The challenge will be to shoot the zombies coming for you.How to Play Pixel Survival?Before you start playing, you must select a level and character. You can have a quick training to get used to controls in Training Mode. Select SandBox mode to explore without concerns. Or else, you choose Zombie Land and will have to overcome numerous challenges.Each character has its own toolset. For example, Policeman spawns with a gun while the farmer has a farming tool. Sports Girl has everything necessary. Try Salaryman, Medic, Sports Girl, Farmer or Policeman and decide who suits your personality more. You can see the percentage for drink, food and life on the left screen. Eat and drink enough to provide energy for the character.
